WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for reporting this! The issue has been fixed and can be tried out in the upcoming 0.9.5 release. We also have a beta available (https://typescript.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=TypeScript%200.9.5%20beta) if you'd like to try it out.
WorkItem.Description: I like to work with Navigate To in Visual Studio 2012. With Navigate To i'm able to access and search for specific methods and classes in my code. However this doesn't work for my TypeScript projects. It doesn't show any results when i type something in the search terms, regardless the casing.

Comments.Message: Thanks for reporting, we're taking a look.
I'm getting this problem pretty regularly as well. Sometimes it'll navigate, but take something like 30 seconds before it does; other times, it doesn't seem to want to do it at all. Highly annoying.
